commander.text: Tell Pilot to confirm the airbrakes are engaged.
Tell Flight Engineer to confirm that the engines are on standby and in open circuit mode.
Tell Navigator to confirm the course.
Tell Flight Control the flight's callsign, and that the flight is standing by for taxi.
When Flight Control clears the flight to taxi onto the runway, tell Flight Engineer to start the engines.
When the engines are started, tell Pilot to taxi onto the runway Flight Control assigned.
When Flight Control clears the flight for liftoff, tell Flight Engineer to retract the airbrakes.
When the airbrakes are retracted, tell Flight Engineer to throttle up to 105%.
When Altitude reaches 100 meters, tell Pilot to pitch up to 15 degrees.
When Navigator says the flight is in Phase 1, tell Pilot to pitch up to 45 degrees.
When Navigator says the spacecraft is approaching Max Q, tell Flight Engineer to throttle down to 70%.
When Navigator says the spacecraft has left Max Q, tell Flight Engineer to throttle up to 105%.
When Navigator says the flight is in Phase 2, tell Pilot to pitch down to 15 degrees.
When Speed reaches 4 Mach, tell Flight Engineer to turn on engine cooling.
When Pilot has turned on the Reaction Control System, tell Flight Engineer to switch the engines to closed mode.
When Flight Engineer has switched the engines to closed mode, tell Pilot to pitch up 45 degrees.
When Navigator says the flight is in Phase 4, tell Flight Engineer to throttle down to zero.
When Flight Engineer has throttled to zero, tell Pilot to turn to prograde.
Tell Flight Engineer to deploy the solar panels.
Tell Pilot to deploy the antennas.

pilot.text: When Commander asks, confirm that the airbrakes are engaged.
When Commander asks, taxi onto the runway.
When Navigator asks, rotate the spacecraft.
When Commander asks, adjust the pitch.
When Commander asks, adjust the pitch again.
When Commander asks, adjust the pitch.
When Altitude reaches 5500 meters, tell Flight Engineer to engage the Stability Assist System (SAS).
When Flight Engineer asks, adjust subsystem settings.
When Commander asks, adjust the pitch.
When Commander asks, turn the spacecraft with the SAS.
When Commander asks, adjust subsystem settings.

navigator.text: When Commander asks, confirm the course is set.
When Pilot says the plane is on the runway, tell Flight Control the flight is standing by for liftoff.
When Speed reaches 0.1 Mach, tell Pilot "V1".
When Speed reaches 0.2 Mach, tell Pilot to rotate.
When Altitude reaches 1000 meters, tell the crew the flight is entering Phase 1.
When Speed reaches 0.75 Mach, or Altitude reaches 3500 meters, tell the crew that the spacecraft is approaching Max Q.
When Speed reaches 0.9 Mach, or Altitude reaches 4 kilometers, tell the crew that the spacecraft has left Max Q.
When Altitude reaches 5 kilometers, tell the crew the flight is entering Phase 2.
When Speed reaches 3 Mach, tell Flight Control that the spacecraft is entering comms blackout.
When Altitude reaches 10 kilometers, or thrust-to-weight ratio (TWR) drops below 1.5, tell the crew the flight is entering Phase 3.
When the apoapsis reaches 120 kilometers, tell the crew the flight is entering Phase 4.
When the altitude reaches 115 kilometers, tell Flight Engineer to set throttle to 70%. Then count down 10 seconds and tell Flight Engineer to set throttle to zero.

Flight Engineer.text: When Commander asks, confirm that the engines are on standby and in open circuit mode.
When Commander asks, start the engines.
When Commander asks, adjust subsystem settings.
When Commander asks, adjust the throttle.
When Commander asks, adjust subsystem settings.
When Commander asks, adjust the throttle.
When Commander asks, adjust the throttle again.
When Pilot asks, adjust subsystem settings.
When Commander asks, adjust engine settings.
When Commander asks, adjust engine settings again.
When Commander asks, adjust the throttle.
When Commander asks, adjust subsystem settings.
When Navigator asks, adjust the throttle.
When Navigator asks, adjust the throttle again.

flight control.text: When the flight checks in, tell them they are cleared to taxi onto Runway 09.
When the flight is on the runway, tell them they are cleared for liftoff.
When Flight Engineer adjusts the throttle, start the game.
When the flight throttles up after Max Q, tell them they are go at throttle up.
